entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
